import React from 'react'; import { Link, useHistory } from 'react-router-dom'; import '../index.css'; import Dropdown from 'react-dropdown'; import 'react-dropdown/style.css'; import logo from '../images/logo.png'; import { OmitProps } from 'antd/lib/transfer/ListBody'; const Header = props => { const history = useHistory(); const user = localStorage.getItem('name'); const Logout = () => { localStorage.clear() history.go('./login') } return ( <>
{ localStorage.getItem('token') ? Logout {user} : Sign In }
